TextView.android:text: If ticked - the program will attempt to match a transaction with a sub-category by using the Match Description and Match Type. If the transaction description from the bank contains 'Match Description' in any part of the description - then it matches. If the Match Type is populated, then it looks for this in any part of the Transaction Type.

Normally if a transaction from the bank has a different amount to the planned amount then it asks you: 'The amount has changed - do you wish to update the amount?' If this is ticked - it is assumed that it is normally paid in several chunks (like Kitchen Appliance insurance) and so it does not ask the question.

Sometime the amount of a planned item changes from a particular date, this allows you to keep all the settings and just provide a new amount. Handy for one off changes. Sometimes the first payment is different to the others. The annual charge for MOT will be different each time.
